name: Devilish Recruits (sheylavperez)
description:
You’re Lucifer and your recruiting troops for your battle against god with a gun that turns angels into cute devils! In this 3D first person shooter game, you’re racing against the clock to get the highest number of devils on your side.

Credit: Snaily -  https://snailygames.itch.io/ and Sheyla - https://sheylavperez.itch.io/

We worked on this project together.
